caption: Two elderly men and a young boy walk inside a vast room filled with red carpets and various fossils on display. Later, the three of them sit at a dining table to share a meal. One of the elderly men holds a lamp and approaches a fossil of a bird, his expression turning fierce as he glares at the other elderly man and the boy. The old man grabs the boy, and they make a run for it. They escape outside but find themselves in a dark canyon. Along the way, they are pursued by many aggressive dogs. With a flying house strapped to their backs, they leap across a chasm to flee.
